general.headline: Experienced Program Manager and Relationship Builder

jobs.jobTitle: Program Manager in Cloud Developer Advocacy team
Community Program Manager – Building Developer Relationships in Central and Eastern Europe
jobs.description:
This position built on my previous role as Audience Evangelism Manager but on larger scale – I was building new relationships with key agnostic and friendly technical influencers and technical communities in Czech, Slovakia, Poland and other countries in CEE.

Thanks to this larger scope I leveraged all experiences from managing CZ and SK communities and influencers and apply learnings from new markets back to CZ and SK.

On top of working with communities I coordinated innovative projects with customers and partners using cutting edge Microsoft technologies (Machine Learning, Cognitive Services, Chatbots etc.).

Due to this larger scope I have learnt to prioritize activities, scale and work as part of distributed team.

jobs.jobTitle: Audience Evangelism Manager – Increasing Awareness within Developer Audiences in CZ and SK
jobs.description:
I was responsible for building new relationships with key technical influencers and technical communities on the Czech market and strengthening relationships with the most impactful local startup accelerators and investors. Despite not having technical background I was able to learn “developers” jargon and become member of the community. 

I was local leader of two Microsoft community programs – MVP program for technical professionals recognized by Microsoft for their technical expertise and MSP program for technical university students passionate about Microsoft technologies.

After 4 months my duties expanded to Slovak market as well.

After graduation at University of Economics I joined Microsoft as Assistant of Leadership team members of Czech Subsidiary. My responsibilities included: complex calendar management, travel management (planning, coordination and travel arrangements), management of team meeting and team events. This position helped me understand the role of leadership team in multinational corporation.

jobs.jobTitle: Assistant of CEO and Fashion Project Manager
jobs.description:
In the role of Assistant of CEO I was responsible for event organization, doing market research, marketing activities (taking care of company social profiles, creating leaflets), recruitment process, managing calendar of CEO, contact with government authorities, correspondence (emails, letters, phone calls) and organizing business trips.

My duties as Project Manager for Fashion project were communication with clients in the Czech Republic and with partners in Italy, promotion of brands and products, organization of events, contact with potential and existing clients, storage agenda and eshop management.

At the beginning I worked as a Receptionist (greeting visitors, processing incoming and outgoing mails, managing office supplies stock, booking flight tickets, hotels, and taxis). Six month later I was promoted to position a Assistant of Management (my duties included managing CFO´s calendar, doing meeting minutes, supporting marketing department, searching and analyzing relevant information and cooperating in data reporting).

jobs.companyName: Consulate General of the Czech Republic
jobs.description: During my Master studies at University of Economics I fell in love with diplomacy and I wanted to gain experiences in the field. I applied for Internship at Consulate General of the Czech Republic in Los Angeles where I spent 3 months as part of Consular section team. I was responsible for communication with the local administration, finding information in the inheritance agenda and the agenda of legal assistance.
